Items.Title: Color Analyzer
Items.Subtitle: Generates a color palette from any UIElement.

Items.Title: MenuFlyout Attach
Items.Subtitle: Provides attached properties and behavior extensions for to support a customizable secondary menu section.

Items.Title: SunTimes Helper
Items.Subtitle: A helper class for calculating sunrise and sunset

Items.Title: SystemTrayIcon
Items.Subtitle: SystemTrayIcon is a class that manages an application’s icon in the Windows system tray. It allows showing an icon, setting a tooltip, handling click events, and displaying a context menu directly from the tray area.

Items.Title: Preview Key Down Helper
Items.Subtitle: A helper that intercepts and processes keyboard input during the PreviewKeyDown stage

Items.Title: Windowed Content Dialog
Items.Subtitle: A dialog control that behaves like ContentDialog but opens in its own window

Items.Title: MessageBox
Items.Subtitle: A simple dialog for displaying messages and prompts with customizable buttons and icons, commonly used for alerts, confirmations, and quick user decisions.

Items.Title: Drag Move And Resize
Items.Subtitle: Drag and Move Window by UIElement

Items.Title: Semantic Version
Items.Subtitle: A helper class for parsing, comparing, and managing version numbers based on Semantic Versioning (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

Items.Title: Color Brightness
Items.Subtitle: A utility for adjusting or evaluating the brightness level of colors, useful for theme adaptation and contrast handling.

Items.Title: Relative Date
Items.Subtitle: A helper that formats dates into human-readable relative strings (e.g., “just now”, “5 minutes ago”, “yesterday”).

Items.Title: System Backdrops
Items.Subtitle: Applying system backdrops (like Mica, Acrylic, or Blur) to windows (Transparent, Acrylic, Mica)

Items.Title: Delegate Command
Items.Subtitle: An ICommand implementation that binds actions and conditions to UI commands

Items.Title: Legacy MessageBox
Items.Subtitle: A classic-style message box that mimics the traditional Windows message dialog

Items.Title: RichText Formatter
Items.Subtitle: Formats a TextBlock/RichTextBlock using HTML-like formatting codes

Items.Title: Credential Helper
Items.Subtitle: A utility for securely storing, retrieving, and managing user credentials, simplifying authentication tasks in applications.

Items.Title: Composition Helper
Items.Subtitle: A utility class that simplifies working with Microsoft.Windows Composition APIs

Items.Title: Validation
Items.Subtitle: A helper for checking and enforcing data rules, ensuring input or properties meet required conditions before processing.

Items.Title: Rainbow Frame
Items.Subtitle: A window with Rainbow Frame

Items.Title: Extensions
Items.Subtitle: A utility class containing reusable extension methods that add functionality to existing types without modifying their original definitions.

Items.Title: Theme Service
Items.Subtitle: Change Application Theme and Material Easily

Items.Title: Update Helper
Items.Subtitle: Check Application Update from Github

Items.Title: Wave ProgressBar
Items.Subtitle: Wave ProgressBar

Items.Title: Loading Indicator
Items.Subtitle: Loading Indicator

Items.Title: Indeterminate ProgressBar
Items.Subtitle: An animated bar where dots move from left to right to indicate ongoing, indeterminate progress.

Items.Title: Halo
Items.Subtitle: The Halo is a set of interconnected UI components for circular or arc-based interfaces.

Items.Title: Offset Box
Items.Subtitle: a ContentControl box which can change content offset by hovering it.

Items.Title: Go To Card
Items.Subtitle: a versatile card control that displays a title, optional icon, and an action button, allowing users to navigate to a URI or trigger a custom action when clicked.

Items.Title: Looping List
Items.Subtitle: An infinitely scrolling selector displayed in a flyout.

Items.Title: Looping Selector
Items.Subtitle: An infinitely scrolling selection control.

Items.Title: Segmented Slider
Items.Subtitle: Slider control that divides its track into multiple visual segments. Each segment can represent a specific range, time span, or category, with individual fill states and labels.

Items.Title: Timeline
Items.Subtitle: A visual control to display a day’s time range with key points like StartTime, EndTime, Sunrise, and Sunset.

Items.Title: Wandering Particles
Items.Subtitle: A visual effect that generates particles moving in random, flowing paths, creating a dynamic and wandering animation.

Items.Title: SnowFlake Effect
Items.Subtitle: A visual effect that simulates falling snowflakes, with customizable particle count.

Items.Title: Flip Cards
Items.Subtitle: A container of multiple FlipBlocks to show time, date, or multi-digit values with dynamic flipping animations.

Items.Title: Flip Block
Items.Subtitle: A single animated panel that “flips” to display a number or character with smooth transitions

Items.Title: Home Page Header
Items.Subtitle: A control for displaying the main header section of a home page, typically including title, subtitle, and Image.

Items.Title: Header Tile
Items.Subtitle: A UI element used to display a compact, interactive header block, often combining an icon, title, and description for quick access or navigation.

Items.Title: Segment Char
Items.Subtitle: A base class representing a digital display character, typically used in custom controls to render segments for numbers or letters (like SixteenSegmentChar, FourteenSegmentChar, MatrixSegmentChar)

Items.Title: Digital Segment
Items.Subtitle: A digital segment is a visual element that represents a portion of a character in a segmented display.

Items.Title: CheckUpdateControl
Items.Subtitle: A control that checks for software updates and notifies the user

Items.Title: OutOfBoxPage
Items.Subtitle: A page displayed during the initial setup or first launch of an application, guiding users through onboarding, configuration, or feature introduction.

Items.Title: Card
Items.Subtitle: A versatile container control that groups related content.

Items.Title: Storage Ring
Items.Subtitle: Progress bar controls displaying as a circular ring.

Items.Title: Storage Bar
Items.Subtitle: Progress bar controls displaying as a horizontal bar.

Items.Title: Gif Image
Items.Subtitle: A control for displaying animated GIFs

Items.Title: Accordion
Items.Subtitle: organizes content into expandable and collapsible sections

Items.Title: Arc Progress
Items.Subtitle: A circular progress indicator that displays progress as a portion of an arc

Items.Title: Dropdown Color Picker
Items.Subtitle: A color selection control that opens a dropdown palette

Items.Title: Color Palette
Items.Subtitle: Presents a set of selectable colors, enabling users to quickly choose or apply colors in an interface.

Items.Title: Split Circle
Items.Subtitle: Circle with 2 different Colors

Items.Title: Header Carousel
Items.Subtitle: Header Carousel

Items.Subtitle: Animated Image

Items.Subtitle: Brush

Items.Subtitle: Overview Page Header

Items.Title: Shortcut
Items.Subtitle: Press a combination of keys to change this shortcut

Items.Subtitle: KeyVisual

Items.Title: Magnifier
Items.Subtitle: A control that zooms in on a portion of the UI or content.

Items.Title: Layered Font Icons
Items.Subtitle: Combine Multiple Icons

Items.Title: Shimmer
Items.Subtitle: Construct a beautiful loading effect

Items.Title: Modal Window
Items.Subtitle: A window that captures user interaction exclusively until it is closed, typically used for dialogs, alerts, or important prompts.

Items.Title: StepBar
Items.Subtitle: A control that visually represents progress through a series of steps or stages, often used in wizards, forms, or multi-step processes.

Items.Title: Layout Transformer
Items.Subtitle: Represents a control that applies a layout transformation to its Content.

Items.Title: Go To Top
Items.Subtitle: Scrolls content back to the top of a page or container when triggered.

Items.Title: Flex Panel
Items.Subtitle: Flex Panel

Items.Title: Honeycomb Panel
Items.Subtitle: A container that allows child elements to present a honeycomb layout.

Items.Title: Element Group
Items.Subtitle: A container that organizes multiple UI elements together.

Items.Title: Compare Slider
Items.Subtitle: Comapre Two Images (Before/After)

Items.Title: Transitioning Content Control
Items.Subtitle: A control that animates content changes, providing smooth visual transitions when the displayed content is updated

Items.Subtitle: Circle Panel

Items.Subtitle: Analog Clock

Items.Title: Date Time Picker
Items.Subtitle: Pick a Date and Time with CalendarWithClock

Items.Title: Calendar With Clock
Items.Subtitle: A CalendarView with a TimePicker/Clock

Items.Subtitle: Progress Button

Items.Title: TextBox
Items.Subtitle: TextBox with Content

Items.Title: Tile Control
Items.Subtitle: TileControl

Items.Title: PinBox
Items.Subtitle: A control for entering or displaying PIN codes, typically splitting input into individual boxes for each digit.

Items.Subtitle: SelectorBar Segmented

Items.Title: Colorful Shimming Effect
Items.Subtitle: Colorful Shimming Effect

Items.Title: Long Shadow TextBlock
Items.Subtitle: Long Shadow TextBlock

Items.Title: Flip Side
Items.Subtitle: A control that allows content to be flipped.

Items.Title: Pager Control
Items.Subtitle: Pager Control

Items.Title: Auto ScrollView
Items.Subtitle: Auto ScrollView

Items.Title: OpacityMaskView
Items.Subtitle: A control that applies an opacity mask to its content, enabling gradient fades, shape-based transparency, or custom visual effects.

Items.Title: Progress Ring
Items.Subtitle: Represents a control that indicates the progress of an operation

Items.Title: Divider
Items.Subtitle: A visual element used to separate content or sections

Items.Title: Shield
Items.Subtitle: Shield

Items.Title: Inline AutoComplete TextBox
Items.Subtitle: Inline AutoComplete TextBox

Items.Title: Linear Gradient Blur Panel
Items.Subtitle: Apply linear gradient blur to the content and the elements behind it.

Items.Title: Orbit Loading Indicator
Items.Subtitle: A composition-based loading indicator with orbiting animations to show progress.

Items.Title: Store Carousel
Items.Subtitle: A modern, Store-style carousel layout inspired by the Microsoft Store, designed to showcase large hero images with titles, descriptions, and action buttons.

Items.Title: Xaml Lights
Items.Subtitle: A set of interactive lighting effects that enhance UI feedback: Ambient adds a constant soft glow, Hover highlights elements when the pointer moves over them, and Ripple creates a brief expanding light when the user clicks or taps.

Items.Title: Image Frame
Items.Subtitle: ImageFrame is a control that loads and displays images with optional rounded corners, shadows, and smooth transitions.

Items.Title: ProfileControl
Items.Subtitle: ProfileControl is a circular profile image control with optional blur, border, and tint effects.

Items.Title: Frosted Glass
Items.Subtitle: FrostedGlass is a control that creates a blurred, frosted‑glass background with configurable tint, blur, and shadow.

Items.Title: Fluid Banner
Items.Subtitle: FluidBanner is a control that displays multiple images in a smooth, fluid banner.

Items.Title: Color Shadow
Items.Subtitle: ColorShadow is a control that draws an image along with a softly blurred, color-based shadow generated from the image itself.

Items.Title: Depth Layer View
Items.Subtitle: Depth Layer View

Items.Title: Shy Header
Items.Subtitle: A header that automatically hides or collapses when scrolling down and reappears when scrolling up.

Items.Title: Flip To Reveal
Items.Subtitle: A control that flips its content to show alternative information or a “back” view, often with a smooth animation.

Items.Title: Composition Image
Items.Subtitle: Composition Image

Items.Title: Composition Brush
Items.Subtitle: Paint XAML UIElements with CompositionBrushes (and load Surfaces from XAML to CompositionBrushes)

Items.Title: Blur Effect Control
Items.Subtitle: A control that applies a blur effect to its content or background.

Items.Title: Blur Effect Manager
Items.Subtitle: A utility that manages and applies blur effects to elements.

Items.Title: Animated Gradient
Items.Subtitle: Simple visual effect showing linear gradient animations

Items.Title: Shimmer TextBlock
Items.Subtitle: Target a TextBlock with a Composition Light

Items.Title: Color Slide Control
Items.Subtitle: Use Visuals and Animations to create a color slide effect during page or state transitions.

Items.Title: Color Bloom Control
Items.Subtitle: Use Visuals and Animations to create a color bloom effect during page or state transitions.

Items.Title: Foreground Focus Effects
Items.Subtitle: Use a BackDrop effect to deemphasize background content.

Items.Title: Composition Animation Controller
Items.Subtitle: Play, pause, speed up, slow down, or scrub your animation with the CompositionAnimationController API

Items.Title: Composition Shadow
Items.Subtitle: Demonstrates how to apply drop shadows to Xaml elements

Items.Title: Spectrum Visualizer
Items.Subtitle: Lightweight real-time audio visualizer capturing system or mic input, displaying dynamic waveforms and spectrum effects.

Items.Subtitle: A TextBlock control which animates the text with customizable effects.

Items.Title: Blended Image
Items.Subtitle: Create a dynamic blend of two images.

Items.Title: Countdown
Items.Subtitle: Countdown is a circular animated timer with customizable border, gradient background, and center text showing remaining seconds or a label.

Items.Title: Circle Icon
Items.Subtitle: CircleIcon is a circular control with customizable border, gradient background, and optional content.

Items.Title: Speed Graph
Items.Subtitle: A dynamic, animated graph control inspired by the Windows 11 copy dialog.

Items.Title: Confetti Cannon
Items.Subtitle: A control that generates animated confetti particles, creating celebratory or festive visual effects.

Items.Title: Hatch
Items.Subtitle: A utility or control that applies patterned fills, such as lines or crosshatches.
